title: History Extra podcast - March 2010
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - March 2010
itunes:subtitle: Glenn Foard reflects on the discovery of the true location of the Bosworth battlefield and Ina Zweiniger-Bargielowska explains the role of rationing in the Second World War.
description:
Glenn Foard reflects on the discovery of the true location of the Bosworth battlefield and Ina Zweiniger-Bargielowska explains the role of rationing in the Second World War.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
